Package org.fcrepo.common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constants
    Constants of general utility.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants.FedoraHome
    Utility to determine and provide the value of the "Fedora Home" constant.
    Models
    Identities of the system content models.
    PID
    A persistent identifier for Fedora digital objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FaultException
    An unchecked exception that signals an unrecoverable error.
    MalformedPIDException
    Thrown when a PID is not well-formed.
